text: I expected a licensed technician, but got a trainee who messed up my alignment.
I booked a mechanic for an oil change but they never showed up—been waiting over an hour and it’s really frustrating.
My car’s fuel filter clogged on a dark country road—no mechanics near me!
Service matching for my RV was flawless—you found a specialized shop.
At least the payment went through smoothly.
I navigated the help section and found answers to my platform questions.
Car broke down in a dangerous part of Oakland at 2 AM. Please match me with the highest-rated tow provider with the shortest ETA!
The real-time tracking of the tow truck was seamless. I knew exactly when they’d arrive.
Can I compare prices for oil changes between different repair shops in my neighborhood?
Does the app support promotional codes or discounts for first-time users?
Brake line snapped on a steep hill in Denver. Car is sliding backward—please send emergency roadside assistance now!
I appreciate no additional fees on holidays—it’s refreshing.
Transmission just died on the freeway near Dallas during rush hour, blocking a lane. Need emergency tow immediately!
My appointment got rescheduled without notice and I have no ride to work tomorrow!
Why are there no mechanics available in downtown Detroit? My engine seized—I’m about to be late for surgery!
How can I see detailed service descriptions before booking?
Can I book a tow for a motorcycle through the app?
Do you offer any warranty or guarantee on the work performed by providers?
I was pleasantly surprised that I could book a mobile mechanic for my BMW at home. Such a convenient service.
Your quote seems way off compared to my usual shop.
Please notify me when a provider is within 5 minutes of arrival.
Much better, thanks!
My brakes are squealing loudly in heavy traffic with no available mechanics—please fix this.
The mobile mechanic you sent to Atlanta didn’t have the right tool for my tire change. Now I have to wait again.
Your surge pricing explanation is clear, but I still felt nickel-and-dimed.
I can’t book a tow right now, but I’m okay for a bit—my car is overheating.
Just sideswiped at high speed—car is totaled and I can’t move. I need rescue!
The app’s map view for nearby providers is incredibly useful.
I booked a tow for my motorcycle and the specialist arrived on time. Fantastic service!
How do I refer a friend to earn credit on my next service?
Chat history resets every time I reopen the app. I lose track of details mid-conversation.
